attributes.action: ensure that police officers who are violent to their children or partners do not remain unpunished for their behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
police officers who strike or are otherwise aggressive to their 
children or partners often remain unpunished as the people who would
normally intervene in these situations are of course their fellow
police officers. This petition asks for greater accountability of the
police service during these situations, to ensure that justice can be
served
